title: Sales of state lotteries in the U.S. 2009 to 2016
summary: In general Sales in billion U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Sales in billion U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2010 to 2012, and lastly roughly constant from 2012 to 2013.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2011 and 2012.
The highest Sales in billion U.S. dollars, of value 68.88 was reached at Year 2013
Minimum Sales in billion U.S. dollars about 58.82 was reached at Year 2010
